name: that's my jam!
description:
⚠ CAUTION: currently an incomplete build. ⚠

If you want the full experience, check back in a few days and I should have the end-of-jam bugs worked out and be able to enable some features that are currently unused.

Controls: ⌨ Arrow Keys / WASD     🎮 Left Analog Stick / DPad

Press in time with the beat (when the white ripples cross the glowing ring)

Made for TOJam 2021: Feels Like a Rerun

Theme: "Once More with Feeling"

Thanks to David Vitas and James Stajov for their music, Kenney.nl for the character assets, mukets for the cassette tape model, and Essqué Productions for the Neon 80s font.
